did.unittitle: American Philosophical Society Archives. Record Group IIc
did.abstract:
This is part of the large inventory for the American Philosophical Society Archives. For complete information concerning this collection, please view the
Collection Description.

did.unittitle: Letter to John Vaughan

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Sir Charles Vaughan thanks John Vaughan for sending him a catalog of the Library of the American Philosophical Society. Sir Charles also refers to the present he has received from Mr. [Roberts] Vaux, a memorial box to William Penn, made from a piece of the Treaty (Elm) Tree, under which Penn negotiated his peace with the Indians.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note

The committee also recommends their promotion to other American literary societies, as well as monies to help them subscribe to the publications.

Further communication from Juan Antonio de Asmitia. Contains also translations of the following letters: M. Galvez to P.S. Du Ponceau; July 5,1836 Pedro Molina to M. Galvez; June 16, 1836 Juan A. de Azmitia to P.S.D.; June 1, 1836 List of mss. sent to P.S.D. by Galvez, July 5, 1836 List of printed books and papers. Cf. Minutes Sept. 16, 1836.
